quest.name: The Hot-blooded Kojin
journal:
Zukin is a picture of panic.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Rescue the hot-headed Kojin on the Isle of Zekki.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Forename, we have a situation! A band of Red have made off with merchandise due to be delivered to Kokajiya...and that isn't the worst of it.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Seeking to reclaim the stolen articles, one of our hot-headed brothers struck out for the Isle of Zekki, but he is slow to return. I fear for his life. Please, find him and bring him back safely!

dialogue.name: BALLOON
dialogue.text: You will pay for your trespass!

dialogue.name: HOTTURTLE03001
dialogue.text: Y-You are of the Divine Circle? My thanks!

dialogue.name: HOTTURTLE03001
dialogue.text: Were it not for your timely intervention, our merchandise would have been lost, never mind my life. But come, let us quit this place ere more Red appear.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Forename, pleased am I to see you hale and whole. Our hot-headed brother, too, returned a short while ago, none the worse for his ill-conceived foray, and with the merchandise intact.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: While it is enough that none of us came to harm, I am grateful that we will be able to fulfill our trade obligations. You have my humblest thanks.
